trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOT_00174_MUTAMIX_000_000<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Uplander is asking Mutamix to shifty-make? Uplander should be hand-swapping five pieces of need-not materia with Mutamix.
TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOT_00174_MUTAMIX_000_020<tab>Mixy-melt, melty-mix, squash and squeeze, squeeze and squash...
TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOT_00174_MUTAMIX_000_030<tab>Bigeyes! Five need-not are reborn as one!
TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOT_00174_MUTAMIX_000_040<tab>Materia reborn glows with much brightshine. For uplander, this is happy-day!

TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOT_00174_MUTAMIX_000_050<tab>Shifty-making is exciting chance-game, yes? Even Mutamix has no knowings of what reborn materia will be! Does uplander's heart not be all flutterdance?
TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOT_00174_MUTAMIX_000_070<tab>Shkohhh? Uplanderbag is clutterfull! Mutamix cannot shifty-make if uplander cannot carry materia reborn!
